content: * please note that this listing is for the ad-free easy to print pdf version of this pattern you can find the free pattern on my blog www theturtletrunk com * the picot blanket features lots of beautiful texture it uses a simple 6 row repeat and can be customized to make any size instructions include 7 sizes ranging from baby stroller - king difficulty easy / advanced beginner standard us crochet terms 7 sizes included baby stroller 30 x35 baby receiving 40 x40 lap 36 x45 throw 48 x60 twin 70 x90 queen 90 x90 king 110 x110 *includes instructions on how to customize the length and width** supplies medium 4 weight yarn in as many colors as you desire 5 50mm i hook yarn needle & scissors yardage ranges from 756 for the smallest baby stroller size to 6 248 for the largest king size patten also includes -gauge pattern -link to free video tutorial -special stitches instructions & photos -written instructions
